lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic lost matches yesterday in the round-robin phase of the season-ending Masters Cup in Shanghai. Djokovic lost to Richard Gasquet of France, 6-4, 6-2, and was eliminated from contention for the semifinals with one match left in the Gold Group. Nadal lost to David Ferrer, 4-6, 6-4, 6-3.Top-ranked Roger Federer and No. 4 Nikolay Daydenko, who lost their first matches Monday, will play each other today, followed by Andy Roddick against Fernando González.
